org.apache.jmeter

类 NewDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jmeter.NewDriver

  • public final class NewDriver
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for JMeter - sets up initial classpath and the loader.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void addPath(java.lang.String path)
      Add a directory or jar to the loader and system classpaths.
      static void addURL(java.lang.String path)
      Add a URL to the loader classpath only; does not update the system classpath.
      static void addURL(java.net.URL url)
      Add a URL to the loader classpath only; does not update the system classpath.
      static java.lang.String getJMeterDir()
      Get the directory where JMeter is installed.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main program which actually runs JMeter.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • addURL

        public static void addURL(java.lang.String path)
                   throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Add a URL to the loader classpath only; does not update the system classpath.
        参数:
        path - to be added.
        抛出:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - when path points to an invalid url

      • addURL

        public static void addURL(java.net.URL url)
        Add a URL to the loader classpath only; does not update the system classpath.
        参数:
        url - The URL to add to the classpath

      • addPath

        public static void addPath(java.lang.String path)
                    throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Add a directory or jar to the loader and system classpaths.
        参数:
        path - to add to the loader and system classpath
        抛出:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if path can not be transformed to a valid URL

      • getJMeterDir

        public static java.lang.String getJMeterDir()
        Get the directory where JMeter is installed. This is the absolute path name.
        返回:
        the directory where JMeter is installed.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main program which actually runs JMeter.
        参数:
        args - the command line arguments
